016package edu.cnm.deepdive.sereknitty.model.entity;
017
018import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
019import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
020import androidx.room.ColumnInfo;
021import androidx.room.Entity;
022import androidx.room.Index;
023import androidx.room.PrimaryKey;
024import java.time.Instant;
025import java.util.UUID;
026
027/**
028 * Encapsulates the data elements maintained for a signed-in user in the app's Room/SQLite-based
029 * persistent data store.
030 */
031@SuppressWarnings("unused")
032@Entity(
033    tableName = "user",
034    indices = {
035        @Index(value = "oauth_key", unique = true),
036        @Index(value = "display_name", unique = true)
037    }
038)
039public class User {
040
041
042  @PrimaryKey(autoGenerate = true)
043  @ColumnInfo(name = "user_id")
044  private long id;
045
046  @ColumnInfo(name = "external_key")
047  private UUID key;
048
049  @NonNull
050  @ColumnInfo(name = "created")
051  private Instant created = Instant.MIN;
052
053  @NonNull
054  @ColumnInfo(name = "modified")
055  private Instant modified;
056
057  @ColumnInfo(name = "oauth_key")
058  @NonNull
059  private String oauthKey = "";
060
061  @ColumnInfo(name = "display_name", collate = ColumnInfo.NOCASE)
062  @NonNull
063  private String displayName = "";
064
065  /**
066   * Returns the auto-generated unique identifier of this instance.
067   */
068  public long getId() {
069    return id;
070  }
071
072  /**
073   * Sets the auto-generated unique identifier of this instance.
074   */
075  public void setId(long id) {
076    this.id = id;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Returns the UUID for this instance.
081   */
082  public UUID getKey() {
083    return key;
084  }
085
086  /**
087   * Sets the UUID for this instance.
088   */
089  public void setKey(UUID key) {
090    this.key = key;
091  }
092
093  /**
094   * Returns the timestamp of the INSERT of this user in the database.
095   */
096  @NonNull
097  public Instant getCreated() {
098    return created;
099  }
100
101  /**
102   * Sets the timestamp of the INSERT of this user in the database.
103   */
104  public void setCreated(@NonNull Instant created) {
105    this.created = created;
106  }
107
108  /**
109   * Returns the timestamp of the UPDATE of this user in the database.
110   */
111  @NonNull
112  public Instant getModified() {
113    return modified;
114  }
115
116  /**
117   * Sets the last timestamp of the UPDATE of this user in the database.
118   */
119  public void setModified(@NonNull Instant modified) {
120    this.modified = modified;
121  }
122
123  /**
124   * Returns the fixed OAuth2.0 identifier (aka <em>subject</em>) of this user.
125   */
126  @NonNull
127  public String getOauthKey() {
128    return oauthKey;
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Sets the fixed OAuth2.0 identifier (aka <em>subject</em>) of this user.
133   */
134  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
135  public void setOauthKey(@NonNull String oauthKey) {
136    this.oauthKey = oauthKey;
137  }
138
139  /**
140   * Returns unique display name of this user.
141   */
142  @NonNull
143  public String getDisplayName() {
144    return displayName;
145  }
146
147  /**
148   * Sets unique display name of this user.
149   */
150  @SuppressWarnings("JavadocDeclaration")
151  public void setDisplayName(@NonNull String displayName) {
152    this.displayName = displayName;
153  }
154
155  /**
156   * Generates the {@link UUID} key for the user.
157   */
158  private void generateKey() {
159    key = UUID.randomUUID();
160  }
161
162  /**
163   * Computes and returns the {@code int}-valued hash code of this instance. Currently, this
164   * computation is based only on the primary key value.
165   */
166  @Override
167  public int hashCode() {
168    return Long.hashCode(id);
169  }
170
171  /**
172   * Compares this instance to {@code obj} for equality and returns a {@code boolean} result.
173   * Currently, this comparison is based only on the type of {@code obj}, and (if
174   * {@code obj instanceof User}) the primary key values of {@code this} and {@code (User) obj}: two
175   * instances of {@link User} are considered equal if and only if their {@code id} field values are
176   * equal and non-zero.
177   *
178   * @param obj Object to compared to {@code this}.
179   * @return {@code true} if {@code this} and {@code obj} should be considered equal; {@code false}
180   * otherwise.
181   */
182  @Override
183  public boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj) {
184    boolean matched;
185    if (obj == this) {
186      matched = true;
187    } else if (obj instanceof User) {
188      User other = (User) obj;
189      matched = (id != 0 && other.id != 0 && id == other.id);
190    } else {
191      matched = false;
192    }
193    return matched;
194  }
195
196
197}
